offer.FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
offer.FAQ.1.question: What if the AI says something inappropriate to a patient?
offer.FAQ.1.answer: In the first months, the AI never sends anything without reception approval. The system proposes - the human decides. Only when the AI achieves 90% accuracy can partial automation be enabled. Difficult cases always go to a human.
offer.FAQ.2.question: Can the AI understand medical terminology?
offer.FAQ.2.answer: Yes, the AI is trained on large medical datasets, so it understands clinical terminology and context. In case of doubt, you can always take control and correct the response.
offer.FAQ.3.question: How much time does my reception need to dedicate to this?
offer.FAQ.3.answer: In the first months, the AI never sends anything without reception approval. The system proposes - the human decides. Only when the AI achieves 90% accuracy can partial automation be enabled. Difficult cases always go to a human.
